verbs.description: [ARG0: Giuliani] [V: says] [ARG1: despite Trump ’s openness to sit down with special counsel Robert Mueller he would strongly advise Trump against it] . He says : “ I ’m going to walk him into a prosecution for perjury like Martha Stewart . ”
